                                                        Feet                                                  Conceptual Transportation Corridor                                             Class II Bike Lanes within the City                                                       Rail Lines                                                                                                                                                                                                                               FIGURE 7

6.12.14                                                                                      NOTES:
                                                                                             Multipurpose Sidewalks - included on all streets as shown on the Street Sections, but not depicted.
                                                                                             Bicycle travel on roadways within Industry is not prohibited; however, it is discouraged for safety reasons.
                                                                                             Bicycle travel is accommodated on all sidewalks in the City. Contact the Planning Department for a map of the
                                                                                             existing Multipurpose Sidewalk system as well as a map depicting the ideal ways to travel through the City.
